meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Hs and atomic number 108.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the properties of hassiums in laboratories.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes hassiums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When the hassiums threw a party, the other elements were excited to join.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of hassiums was like finding a hidden treasure in science.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering hassiums glowed under the microscope, revealing their secrets.

meanings.sent1: The periodic table lists various elements, including hassiums.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, researchers compare the properties of different hassiums.
meanings.sent3: The hassiums on the shelf seemed to be having a lively conversation.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of hassiums, each with its own story.
meanings.sent5: The container held a collection of colorful hassiums, each unique in its own way.
